mode.script: function on_new_client(client) -- Get spawn point local spawnpoints = Game.get():getEntities("spawnpoint") local position = Vector2F(); if spawnpoints:getSize() == 0 then print("Warning: No spawn point set!") position = Vector2F(2, 2) end local index = math.random(spawnpoints:getSize()) - 1 local spawnpoint = spawnpoints:getEntity(index) position = spawnpoint:getPosition() -- Add player local tpl = EntityTemplate.get("player") local playerstate = EntityState.create(tpl) playerstate:getProperty("position"):setVector2F(position) local weapon = Game.get():addEntity("plasmagun", client) local player = Game.get():addEntity("player", client, playerstate:get()) player:getScript():callFunction("on_set_weapon", weapon:getID()) end
